long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎓 WinkWink Search - Find Answers to Questions on Web Pages via Quizlet (Alpha/Beta) 📚

Description:

WinkWink is a browser extension designed to help you quickly find answers to questions on web pages using Quizlet’s extensive library of flashcards and study sets. Whether you’re studying for an exam, preparing a lesson, or just trying to get quick answers, WinkWink is here to make things faster and simpler. 💡

This is an early version (alpha/beta) of WinkWink, and we’re actively seeking feedback and suggestions from users like you to shape the future of this extension. Some features, like Google Search integration and Dark Mode 🌙, are currently disabled or in development, and we appreciate your understanding as we test and improve functionality.

Key Features:

🔍 Search with Wink (Context Menu): Just highlight any text on a webpage, right-click, and select "Search with Wink." WinkWink will instantly show relevant results from Quizlet, without you ever having to leave the page.

⌨️ Keyboard Shortcut Search: Quickly search for selected text using the shortcut Ctrl + Shift + X (or Command + W on Mac) to find study sets without interrupting your workflow.

📝 Popup Search: Not just limited to highlighted text! You can type directly into the WinkWink popup to find related answers from Quizlet.

⚡ Instant Results: Results appear quickly in the popup, giving you fast access to study materials without needing to switch tabs.

🎯 Customizable Results: Choose how many answers or study sets you want to display, making it easy to find the best match for your query.

Why You Should Install WinkWink:

👩‍🏫 Designed for Students and Teachers: If you’re a student trying to ace your next quiz 🏆 or a teacher gathering materials, WinkWink simplifies your search for answers.

🌐 Seamless Browser Integration: Easily search and find relevant Quizlet sets without leaving the page you’re on, helping you stay focused.

🔒 Safe and Secure: WinkWink only accesses publicly available Quizlet data and does not store or track your personal information.

💸 No More Paid Alternatives: With WinkWink, you get fast, free access to helpful study materials, so you don’t need to rely on expensive alternatives that may not offer better features.

Please Note:

🚧 Early Features and Feedback: This is an early version of WinkWink, so some features like Google Search and Dark Mode are disabled while we gather feedback. The goal is to refine the experience and roll out new features based on user suggestions. We’d love to hear your thoughts! 💬

🙌 Support Future Development: If you find WinkWink useful, consider supporting its continued development through donations. Every contribution helps keep WinkWink free and enables us to expand the feature set! 💖

Legal Disclaimer:

⚖️ Legal: This software is intended strictly as a study tool to aid student comprehension. It is strictly disallowed to use this software as a tool to facilitate cheating of any kind, including but not limited to homework, quizzes, tests, exams, or other academic materials. WinkWink is designed to enhance learning and should not be used in any manner that violates academic integrity policies.
